name: Brite
description:
The Darkness is closing in, but there is still hope so long as a spark remains.

Brite is a straightforward, short (~1hr) game, designed for the Indie Game Maker Competition 2017.

Play as a small flame in a world of darkness, battling rain, cold and shadow in order to restore light and warmth to the world.

Features:

  • A subtle storyline
  • Original soundtrack
  • Unique character models
  • Intuitive light-based gameplay mechanics

Cherry-picked reviews:

“I don’t have any complaints about this. It’s just really cool. Except for I can’t kill the mushroom.” – Indiegamer

“That OST is lit.” - Readydotexe

“Simplistic, yet unique.” - Amudeus

“Unique!  This's my first time I'm playing game with the battle system like this.” – Stailgames
